page.title: 07People Who Help Us (II).
page.content: A FIREMAN puts out fires in houses, factories of in the streets. They also help people if they are trapped. If a cat has got stuck up a tree they will get it down. AN AMBULANCE MAN comes to take you to hospital if you are ill or have had a bad accident. Sometimes ambulance men take women to hospital to have a baby. DOCTORS AND NURSES look after sick people and try to make them better. Sometimes people have to have an operation and stay in hospital for a long time. A SHOPKEEPER is someone who works in a shop selling different kinds of products. Sometimes we go to a local shop for food and sometimes we go to town to buy clothes.
